price: (21) So he left it, fearful and anticipating [apprehension]. He said, "My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people."
arabic: فَخَرَجَ مِنۡهَا خَآئِفٗا يَتَرَقَّبُۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fakharaja min'hā khāifan yataraqqabu qāla rabbi najjinī mina al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
